attributes.action: disclose expenses  for all elected members of national and local government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is for full disclosure of expense claims made by councilors, MPs, and MEPs.

The revenue (the government's accountant) can inspect our books at any time, and likewise we should be able to inspect the books of the people we elect to spend our taxes.

Please sign and support this cause.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
